ratings.notes: proposed_contextual_controlled   4  5  3  4  The response is contextually relevant and consistent with the persona but lacks some naturalness in phrasing.
baseline_no_context             2  3  4  3  Response shows fair trade principles, somewhat inconsistent with urgency-driven player input for discounts.
the response is highly relevant, consistent with the persona of an Old Merchant who values fairness but understands urgency; natural and high-quality dialogue that maintains character integrity.
